official_title: A bill to authorize a demonstration project under section 6 of the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to undertake a demonstration project under the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to provide for water-based mass transportation service from Jersey City, New Jersey, to the shore of Sandy Hook Bay, and from Keyport New Jersey, to the shore of Sandy Hook Bay.

titles.title: A bill to authorize a demonstration project under section 6 of the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964.
